hadith.chapter: Types of Blood-Wit (Kitab Al-Diyat) - كتاب الديات
hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا موسى بن إسماعيل، حدثنا وهيب، عن خالد، بهذا الإسناد نحو معناه ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by Khalid through the same chain of narrators to the same effect.
